content: The Logitech G502 HERO has an ergonomic design that provides a comfortable grip for most hand sizes, and it is designed to reduce fatigue during long gaming sessions. The mouse has rubber grips on the side to prevent slippage, and its all-matte finish provides a smooth surface for comfortable dragging. However, as everyone's hand size and grip preferences are different, I would still suggest trying the mouse out for yourself before making a final purchase if possible. This will help you ensure that the Logitech G502 HERO feels comfortable during extended gaming sessions regardless of its design.
